item.title: Prepare yourself for the Windows 10 experience on all your devices
item.description: Microsoft introduced a new, more personalized version of Windows designed to provide a consistent experience across a variety of devices, from Xbox and PCs to phones, tablets, and more. Windows 10 aims to adapt to different devices and user activities, creating a unified and user-friendly experience. CEO Satya Nadella emphasized the goal of making Windows 10 beloved by current users and attracting billions more. The company prioritizes a seamless experience across devices, supporting natural interactions like voice, gestures, and gaze.
